title: My Mother And My Ex Are Besties

description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been divorced for almost 3 years and I moved away after the divorce to start anew. My husband was an avid cheater and my mother finally told me after he’d been having an affair with a woman for over 6 months. My mother is employed by my ex-husband as his accountant. He has two businesses that do very well in the small town they’re in.................................
